https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/iM2uWkC1BklUQiFcrZCQGSkZxeq.jpg Kenichi Sonoda announced at Anime Central that he launched a Kickstarter campaign to fund a new "Bean Bandit" anime. He confirmed that the project will meld elements of Riding Bean and Gunsmith Cats, and like these previous works it will take place in Chicago. Bean Bandit
